level.text: 404.1 The Authority shall develop a rental rate schedule for all events bookedt its venues.
404.2 The rate schedule, and any amendments to the schedule, shall be subjecto approval by the President and Chief Executive Officer.
404.3 The President and Chief Executive Officer may in his discretion chargegencies of the District government a rate equal to one-half the publishedental rate.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 29 DCR 259, 261 (January 15, 1982); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 50 DCR 3035 (April 18, 2003); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 8962 (June 14, 2013).
